title: News digest [No. 4]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items include: “Parade of Champions” - Stockwell Stud, Diggers Rest annual open day to raise funds for Royal Children’s hospital with stallions parading at a racing stud, show the finer points of horse breeding. “Boatmen” - waterfront activities by dockworkers at the Melbourne Ports, retrieving lines from berthing ships do hazardous work. “Man of Metal” - Montsalvat, Eltham, sculptor using scrap-metal for works (Mackam Skipper) with his sister together design and execute metal screens for the National University. “Jungle Gym” - Bayswater Rotary Club provides elephant-like playground equipment.
